instruction: In this task, we can are given an english sentence and the goal is to generate a text in 'turkish' language that is a faithful translation of the input sentence
In this task, we can are given an english sentence and the goal is to generate a text in 'turkish' language that is a faithful translation of the input sentence
input: "We will vote for Özcan Purçu from CHP. He is one of us. We are proud of him. Romani people won't be ashamed of themselves. He will lead the way up for us."
output: "Şimdi Özcan Purçu için CHP’ye vereceğiz. Çünkü bizdendir. Gururumuz. Bundan önce de Roman doktor, asker vardı ama hep kendisini gizlerdi. Şimdi Romanların önünü açacak..."
